title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, metal wire, metal sequins, wooden core
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Knotted white linen tassel with human figures decorated with coiled metal wire and hammered metal sequins.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:

17th century. Medium: linen, metal wire, metal sequins, wooden core
